title: mesh
description: A set of primitives to be rendered.  A node can contain one or more meshes.  A node's transform places the mesh in the scene.

primitives.description: An array of primitives, each defining geometry to be rendered with a material.

weights.description: Array of weights to be applied to the Morph Targets.

closed.description: Specifies whether the mesh is closed (watertight).
closed.gltf_detailedDescription: Specifies whether the mesh is closed (watertight).  Application can use this property within rendering techniques where it is important to consider - e.g. when applying clipping planes capped with material or just to enable back-face culling (regardless of doubleSided property of material).
